name: Keep Them Alive | Ludum Dare 46
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 Compo. All of the game and it's components were made by me in 48 hours. This was my first ever actual game and first ever game jam. I hope you enjoy!

Source Code:https://github.com/Adfre12yu/KeepThemAliveSourceCode
